name: The Adventures of Cuby
description:
The Adventures of Cuby is a challenging platforming game where you are a cube rocketing around over 40 levels, saving all the cubes that Sphere Man captured.

There are five worlds in The Adventures of Cuby: The Plains, The Mountains, The Volcanic Outskirts, The Volcano, and the boss level, The Sky.

The Plains:

Things start out easy as you explore grassy levels while avoiding water.

The Mountains:

There's water everywhere in these icy mountains. Slip and you'll fall into a nice big puddle of, well, water.

The Volcanic Outskirts:

Near the volcano there's plenty of cooling lava to take a bath in, but don't: it deals two damage.

The Volcano:

It's burning hot here in the volcano. Definitely do NOT take a bath in this! It will kill you if you touch it! Why did Sphere Man have to hide in such a scorching hot place?!

The Sky:

The final world in The Adventures of Cuby. Here you save captured cubes before Sphere Man comes and smashes you while riding a cloud. How did you get here? By being blasted out of a volcano of course!

Want to get the free demo before buying the full version? Click here.
